casebody.data:
THE MIAMI BEACH RAILWAY COMPANY, a Florida Corporation, v. HELEN M. LEMON, a widow. 22 So. (2nd) 764

June Term, 1945

July 10, 1945 Division B Loftin, Anderson, Scott, McCarthy & Preston, for appellant. McKay, Dixon & DeJarnette, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

Judgment affirmed upon condition that plaintiff below enter a remittitur in the cause in the amount of $1500 within thirty days after the mandate goes down. Otherwise, the judgment is reversed and a new trial awarded.

*339It is so ordered.

CHAPMAN, C. J., BROWN, THOMAS and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
